get.description: This API fetches details of a template message.

parameters.name: modifiedAfter
parameters.description: After which date entities to be included. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

schema.description: After which date entities to be included. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: Department ID for which the canned messages to be fetched

schema.description: Department ID for which the canned messages to be fetched

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of canned messages to fetch

schema.description: Number of canned messages to fetch

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Index number, starting from which the canned messages must be fetched

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the canned messages must be fetched

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by MessageType. Allowed values are @TEMPLATE@

schema.description: Filter by MessageType. Allowed values are @TEMPLATE@

departmentId.description: Department ID of the canned message

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Department ID for which the canned messages to be fetched
Filter by MessageType. Allowed values are @TEMPLATE@
Filter with Status of Message Applicable only if messageType is Template. Allowed values are @PENDING@, @FAILED@, @APPROVED@, @REJECTED@
